overview: Have you ever had the fantasy of relinquishing total control in your relationship and telling another man to “Fuck Your Boyfriend?” Tyler Roberts watches as Andrey Vic breeds his man, Jesse Santana. Dakota Payne and Jeffrey Lloyd step out on their partners to have bareback sex together. Sean Xavier and Andre Donovan swap their boyfriends, Wagner Vittoria and Lucas Leon. And Andre Donovan wrecks Jason Cox hole while Mike Maverick watches on in excitement!
title: Fuck My Boyfriend
